message: I force my heavy eyelids open and blink several times.
...What time is it?
I raise my arm to look at the clock on my Coil. It's the middle of the night.
I remember sitting down on the couch and falling asleep...
A dull throbbing fills my head.
I feel like I had some kind of dream... but I can't remember it.
My throat is dry. I need some water...
Huh?
When I get up from the couch, I notice Ren is missing.
Normally, he always sleeps at my feet.
...What was that?
I thought I heard something from the second floor.
I go upstairs and find Noiz sitting on a couch.
The first area on the second floor is something of a den. In addition to the sofas, it has a TV and a bar.
Farther down the hall are doors that I assume lead to bedrooms.
Wait... What's Noiz doing?
He must not have noticed me come up the stairs, because he doesn't even glance my way.
Maybe he's the kind of person who shuts out the world when he's concentrating.
I approach the couch and look over Noiz's shoulder. Instantly, the blood drains from my face.
Ren!
Ren is sitting upside down in Noiz's lap, and Noiz has tools in his hands!

name: 蒼葉
message: "What the hell do you think you're doing?!"
Noiz turns around.

name: ノイズ
message: "Oh, you're up?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "What difference does that make?! Let Ren go! Give him back right now!"
I lean over the back of the couch and snatch the blue lump from Noiz's lap.
Worried, I immediately start him up. It takes a bit longer than usual, but Ren finally opens his eyes.

name: 蓮
message: "Aoba."

name: 蒼葉
message: "You okay? Nothing weird?"

name: 蓮
message: "No issues detected."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Phew..."
After I breathe a sigh of relief, I turn to glare at Noiz.

name: 蒼葉
message: "What the hell did you do to Ren?"

name: ノイズ
message: "I didn't do anything."

name: 蒼葉
message: "You were obviously up to something."

name: ノイズ
message: "Sure, but I wasn't trying to fuck with him or anything. Man, there really is something wrong with you."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah? What's wrong with me?"

name: ノイズ
message: "Like I said after the last fight, you're way too fucking attached to that Allmate. Grow up."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Ngh! Where the hell do you get off...!"
I put Ren down on the floor, walk around the couch and get right in Noiz's face.
I can't let him get away with that.
I reach for his collar... but then, I see something.
...Blood.
Blood is dripping from Noiz's fingers.

name: 蒼葉
message: "You're hurt?!"

name: ノイズ
message: "Yeah. Nicked myself with a tool."
When I snatched Ren away from him?
I can't think of when else it might've happened. He didn't look hurt when I was watching him before that...
Which means... it's my fault.
My anger instantly turns to shame.
Even if I didn't do it on purpose, I can't bring myself to hit someone who's injured.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Shit, I'm sorry. That was probably my fault. Let me see your hand. We should stop the bleeding fir―"

name: ノイズ
message: "It's fine."

name: 蒼葉
message: "It's not fine. Let me see."

name: ノイズ
message: "I'm fine."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Come on..."

name: ノイズ
message: "Don't touch me. I'll do it myself."
Noiz smacks my hand away.
As I stand there, staring like an idiot, he gets up and heads down the hall.
